 2024-02152024-03-25IRCC
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisAppointment of NICHOLAS GEORGE HERSH of Gatineau, Quebec, to be a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Ottawa District Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective April 11, 2024.
